name: Wakasagihime's Ocean Expedition
description:
Wakasagihime gets to explore the ocean!

Dive for crabs and other treasure to earn money, and buy upgrades to help you dive for longer. Yukari wants Wakasagihime to bring her horseshoe crabs — just what is the infamous gap-youkai planning to do with all those crabs?

A game inspired by Ecco the Dolphin and Wakasagihime Speed Swimming (the only other Touhou fan-game inspired by Ecco, to my knowledge).

Basic controls
  • Arrows keys: Move
  • Z: Dash attack
  • X: Increases movement and dash speed

Combine the faster movement and a well-timed dash to jump high above the water's surface and reach new places. Swim around a bit to accelerate, and give it your best!

Salty Mermaid

Wakasagihime is a freshwater mermaid! Since she's so strong, she can survive in seawater for a while, but she needs to resurface regularly to restore her "salt-resistance"™.

Extra controls
  • Esc: Pause
  • R: Reset current mission

Touhou Project original concept, characters, and other elements are the property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice. This game is a fanmade work made according to the official guidelines. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creators.

Made as a submission to the Touhou Station 2021 game jam. Theme of the game: Buy/Sell
